sentences.en: A suggested explanation, so long as its correctness is still in doubt, is called a hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 提出来的解释, 只要它的正确性仍然有疑问, 便称为假说.

sentences.en: An early version of the hypothesis is due to Griffith.
sentences.cn: 这个假说的早期看法是格里菲思提到的.

sentences.en: Fermi's suggestion was more than a verbal hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 费密的见解不仅是词句上的假设.

sentences.en: Her hypothesis concerns the role of electromagnetic radiation.
sentences.cn: 她的假说涉及到电磁辐射的作用.

sentences.en: If this hypothesis is correct certain other consequences flow from it.
sentences.cn: 如果这个假说是正确的话,肯定由此还会得出其他的推论.

sentences.en: No serious arguments that dispute this hypothesis have been advanced.
sentences.cn: 对于这些前提,尚未发生激烈的争论.

sentences.en: One hypothesis is that the victim fell asleep while driving.
sentences.cn: 一种假设是受害人开车时睡着了。

sentences.en: Streaming is still the only hypothesis to account for translocation in fungus.
sentences.cn: 胞质流还仅仅是一种解释真菌中转移的假说.

sentences.en: Such a hypothesis raises other questions in its turn.
sentences.cn: 这样的假设会相继引出另一些问题.

sentences.en: The hypothesis no longer belongs to the realm of science fiction.
sentences.cn: 这种设想已不是科学幻想.

sentences.en: The mathematical formulation of this hypothesis is a persuasive one.
sentences.cn: 这一假设的数学形式是诱人的.

sentences.en: The results confirmed his hypothesis on the use of modal verbs.
sentences.cn: 结果证实了他的关于情态动词用法的假设.

sentences.en: The theory is based on the hypothesis that all men are born equal.
sentences.cn: 这个理论基于人人平等的前提.

sentences.en: This distribution is not inconsistent with the counterflow hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 这种分配并不与逆向流动假说相矛盾.

sentences.en: What until then had been a hypothesis, became an article of faith.
sentences.cn: 在此之前还只是一种假设的东西, 变成了一种信条.

sentences.en: Work will now begin to test the hypothesis in rats.
sentences.cn: 现在将开始在老鼠身上做实验以验证该假设。

phrases.tran_cn: 有效市场假说；有效率市场假说
零假设；虚假设；解消假设
黎曼假设（等于黎曼猜想）

trans.tran_en: an idea that is suggested as an explanation for something, but that has not yet been proved to be true
